name: Thai Satay Pork Chops

ingredients.name: natural peanut butter or nut-free pea or seed butter
center-cut fast fry pork loin chops

preparation: In bowl, add seasoning, coconut milk, peanut or nut-free butter, and soy sauce. Using the 2-in-1 Citrus Press, squeeze in juice from lime. Whisk to combine. Set aside.
Heat oil in a large frying pan over medium-high heat. Add pork chops; fry until browned, 2–3 min per side.
Stir in reserved sauce; reduce heat to medium and simmer for 2–3 min, flipping pork chops halfway through.
Place pork on plates and spoon sauce on top. Top each with 1⁄2 cup cabbage and toppings, if desired.
tips: Make it vegetarian: Swap pork chops with 1 lb (450 g) firm organic tofu, cut into steaks.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 1⁄2 cup rice noodles, and 1⁄2 cup sliced vegetables, your choice.
